com.bitplan.pdfindex

Class Pdfindexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitplan.pdfindex.Pdfindexer

  • public class Pdfindexer
extends Object
    indexer for PDF files inspired by http://kalanir.blogspot.de/2008/08/indexing-pdf-documents-with-lucene.html
    Author:
    wf

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Pdfindexer.DocumentSource
      allow different Document Sources e.g. from file or from uri
